mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carrel 4-10, upper shelf|upper edge
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lee, Jenny [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Scribbled out quote by fictitious character Old Gregg of the British comedy troupe, The Mighty Boosh, to which another graffiti responds by describing Old Gregg's fishy characteristics. Also, another graffiti mentions a variety of Irish liquor, to which another graffiti responds favorably. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
do y'love me? could y'learn t'love me? -Old Gregg | Scaley Man Fish | 4/11 | Baileys | mmm creamy
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Quotations
Television programs
Alcohol
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: University of Virginia. Library. New Stacks. Charlottesville, Virginia, United States
